channel.title: RuneScape in Spanish/Portuguese/French?
channel.description:
Well, I was on their job vacancies site just now, and I noticed these two vacancies:
Translation Team Leader (Portuguese) This is a great opportunity for an enthusiastic Translation Team Leader, who will be responsible for managing major parts of the translation project, leading the Portuguese Translation Team, defining the overall creative direction of the translations, as well as liaising with an external team of translators and testers. ====================================================================================================================================== Translator (French) Jagex Ltd, developer and publisher of online games, seeks a highly creative and motivated individual to translate content from our fantasy themed MMORPG, RuneScape, from English into French. Excellent language skills and previous translation experience are essential.
Also, a couple of days ago, I saw a similar position: Translator (Spanish) with almost the same description as a french translator, so I assume that there's also gonna be a spanish RS? Conspiracy/discuss/etc.

item.title: RuneScape in Spanish/Portuguese/French?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

I hope its not true, if they have to translate it to Spanish/Portuguese/French good stuff will take longer time to complete and Runescape will be worse than ever.

And io9, since you was on the job vacancies site did you want a job in Jagex. (io9 steals the Runescape source code, make a 1337 24/7 Moparscape private server. (My Conspiracy))

Read full topic

Well, I was on their job vacancies site just now, and I noticed these two vacancies:

Translation Team Leader (Portuguese)

This is a great opportunity for an enthusiastic Translation Team Leader, who will be responsible for managing major parts of the translation project, leading the Portuguese Translation Team, defining the overall creative direction of the translations, as well as liaising with an external team of translators and testers.

======================================================================================================================================

Translator (French)

Jagex Ltd, developer and publisher of online games, seeks a highly creative and motivated individual to translate content from our fantasy themed MMORPG, RuneScape, from English into French. Excellent language skills and previous translation experience are essential.

Also, a couple of days ago, I saw a similar position: Translator (Spanish) with almost the same description as a french translator, so I assume that thereâ€™s also gonna be a spanish RS?
